oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with James H. Crowder, 1986 August 28, excerpt 15
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nashville barbershop owner James H. Crowder, conducted on 28 August 1986 by Reavis Mitchell as part of the Homecoming '86 Oral History Project. Crowder discusses how his father ran a ten-chair barber shop and barber college. The complete interview, as well an index, is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crowder, James Henry, 1908-1997--Interviews
